scripts.clean:cache: bun rimraf node_modules/.cache/ && bun rimraf node_modules/.vite
scripts.lint: bun concurrently 'bun run lint:tsc' 'bun run lint:script'
scripts.copy:loaders: mkdir -p dist/loaders dist/runtime && cp -r dist/loaders/ dist/ && cp -r dist/runtime/ dist/ && [ -f vue-lynx-entry.js ] && cp vue-lynx-entry.js dist/ || echo 'No entry file to copy'
scripts.build:ios: bun run build:loaders && npx rspeedy build -c lynx.ios.config.ts
scripts.build:android: bun run build:loaders && npx rspeedy build -c lynx.android.config.ts
scripts.dev:ios: bun run build:loaders && npx rspeedy dev -c lynx.ios.config.ts
scripts.dev:ios-qr:
bun run build:loaders && (sleep 5 && bun run qrcode && echo '
Development server is running in hot-reload mode. Copy the URL above to your simulator.
Press Ctrl+C to stop.
') & npx rspeedy dev -c lynx.ios.config.ts
scripts.dev:android: bun run build:loaders && npx rspeedy dev -c lynx.android.config.ts
scripts.dev:ios-simulator:
bun run build:loaders && (sleep 5 && bun run qrcode && echo '
Now copy the URL shown above and paste it into the iOS simulator.
') & npx rspeedy dev -c lynx.ios.config.ts --open
scripts.build:ios:vue: bun run build:loaders && bun x rspeedy build -c lynx.vue.config.ts
scripts.dev:ios:vue: bun run build:loaders && bun x rspeedy dev -c lynx.vue.config.ts
scripts.dev:ios-qr:vue:
bun run build:loaders && (sleep 5 && bun run qrcode && echo '
Development server is running in hot-reload mode. Copy the URL above to your simulator.
Press Ctrl+C to stop.
') & bun x rspeedy dev -c lynx.vue.config.ts --write-to-disk && node scripts/create-ios-lynx-bundle.js --watch
scripts.logs:ios:lynx: xcrun simctl spawn booted log stream --predicate 'subsystem contains "Lynx"' --level debug
scripts.logs:ios:all: xcrun simctl spawn booted log stream
scripts.serve:ios:vue: bun run build:loaders && node scripts/create-ios-lynx-bundle.js && cd dist/vue-lynx && bun run simple-server.js
scripts.lynx:build: bun run build:loaders && bun x rspeedy build -c lynx.vue.config.ts && node scripts/transform-lynx-bundle.js
scripts.lynx:dev: bun run build:loaders && bun x rspeedy dev -c lynx.vue.config.ts
scripts.lynx:ios: bun run lynx:build && (sleep 2 && bun run qrcode) & bun x rspeedy preview -c lynx.vue.config.ts
